issue.title: [C++][CI] Remove outdated Github Actions ARM builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13211](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13211). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We used to have ARM self-hosted workers configured for GHA. These builds are permanently set to disabled, we should rather remove those jobs to reduce the noise both in the configuration file and the PR checks.
